main event: A white star-like object was observed moving erratically, accompanied by a deep roaring noise, on 8 October 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10 seconds., The object was reported as the size of a pea., Witnesses heard a sound from inside a garage as they saw the object above their house., The sighting was concluded to be a meteor., The object disappeared and possibly faded in brightness.
witness description: Witnesses reported seeing a star-like object accompanied by a sound.
